text: The Linguistic Society of Hong Kong (LSHK) is a non-profit academic association, which was formally registered as a charitable organization in Hong Kong on 8 March 1986. They are the creators of "The Linguistic Society of Hong Kong Cantonese Romanization Scheme" known as Jyutping. ==External links== * Category:Languages of Hong Kong Category:Linguistic societies
title: Linguistic Society of Hong Kong
